      • selectFromResult

        public static int[] selectFromResult(cern.colt.matrix.DoubleMatrix2D matrix,
                     cern.colt.matrix.DoubleMatrix2D evMatrix)
        Select some of the axes as pivots according to the angle between them , no duplicate axes will be selected.
        参数:
        the - original distance matrix
        matrix - of eigenvector from runLLE
        返回:
        result indices
